thread.title: The Bottom Line Wins First State Award
thread.title_full: The Bottom Line Wins First State Award

author: Executive Content Editor
title: The Bottom Line Wins First State Award
text:
Gwendolyn Wu
Executive Content Editor
The Bottom Line gets to add one more adjective to its description this week: award-winning.
At the C alifornia College Media Awards ceremony on Saturday, TBL took home third place for Best Features Photograph for a college with more than 10,000 students. Taken by second year film and media studies major Mark Lasa, the photo features Hijinio Camacho, an elotero beloved by students and families in Isla Vista. This is TBLâ€™s first statewide award.
The CCMAs celebrate the work of colleges throughout California, dividing schools into three categories: community college, less-than-10,000 students, and more-than-10,000 students. The full list of winners can be found here .
